question: Which of the following statements is true for the Form Designer?

statement_options.a: To add a field to the form layout, drag the field from the Fields tab to the desired destination on the form.
statement_options.b: To create a new field on a form's table, drag the appropriate data type from the Field Types tab to the form and then configure the new field.
statement_options.c: To remove a field from the form layout, hover over the field to enable the Action buttons, and select the Delete (X) button.
statement_options.d: To add a section to the form layout, drag it from the Field Types tab to the desired destination on the form.

explanation: Statements a, b, and c are correct[cite: 12, 13]. Statement d is incorrect because sections are not added by dragging from the Field Types tab[cite: 7, 12].

question: Which of the following are configured in an Email Notification?

statement_options.b: What content will be in the notification.

explanation: Email notifications are primarily configured based on Who, What, and When[cite: 17, 18, 25].

question: To see what scripts, reports, and other application artifacts will be in a published application:

options.A: Enter the name of the Application in the Global search field
options.B: Open the list of Update Sets for the instance
options.C: Examine the Application Files Related List in the application to be published
options.D: Open the artifact records individually to verify the value in the Application field

question: Which one of the following is NOT a debugging strategy for client-side scripts?

options.A: g_form.addInfoMessage()
options.D: gs.log()

question: Which Application Access configuration field(s) are NOT available if the Can read configuration field is NOT selected?

options.A: All access to this table via web services
options.B: Can create, Can update, and Can delete
options.C: Can read does not affect the availability of other Application Access fields
options.D: Allow configuration

question: Which of the following is NOT a trigger type in Flow Designer?

options.A: Outbound Email
options.D: Schedule

question: When creating new application files in a scoped application, cross scope access is turned on by default in which of the following?

options.A: REST messages
options.D: Workflow

question: In an Email Notification, which one of the following is NOT true for the Weight field?

options.A: Only Notifications with the highest weight for the same record and recipients are sent
options.B: A Weight value of zero means that no email should be sent
options.C: The Weight value defaults to zero
options.D: A Weight value of zero means the Notification is always sent when the Notification's When to send criteria is met

question: Which of the following objects does a Display Business Rule NOT have access to?

options.A: previous
options.D: current

question: Which of the following features are available to Global applications? (Choose two.)

options.A: Automated Test Framework
options.D: Flow Designer

question: Which one of the following is NOT a UI Action type?

options.A: List choice
options.D: Form choice

question: Which of the following is NOT supported by Flow Designer?

options.A: Call a subflow from a flow
options.D: Run a flow from a MetricBase Trigger

question: Which of the following are true for reports in ServiceNow? (Choose three.)

options.A: Any user can see any report shared with them.
options.B: Can be a graphical representation of data.
options.C: All users can generate reports on any table.
options.D: Can be run on demand by authorized users.
options.E: Can be scheduled to be run and distributed by email.

question: Modules must have a Link type. Which one of the following is a list of Link types?

options.A: List of Records, Separator, Catalog Type, Roles
options.B: Assessment, List of Records, Separator, Timeline Page
options.C: List of Records, Content Page, Order, URL (from arguments:)
options.D: Assessment, List of Records, Content Page, Roles

question: Which one of the following is true for a table with the Allow configuration Application Access option selected?

options.A: Only the in scope application's scripts can create Business Rules for the table
options.B: Any user with the application's user role can modify the application's scripts
options.C: Out of scope applications can create Business Rules for the table
options.D: Out of scope applications can add new tables to the scoped application

question: When working in the Form Designer, configuring the label of a field in a child table changes the label on which table(s)?

options.A: base table
options.D: all tables

question: Which one of the following is true?

options.A: A UI Policy's Actions execute before the UI Policy's Scripts
options.B: The execution order for a UI Policy's Scripts and Actions is determined at runtime
options.C: A UI Policy's Scripts execute before the UI Policy's Actions
options.D: A UI Policy's Actions and Scripts execute at the same time

question: Here is the Business Rule script template: (function executeRule (current, previous... This type of JavaScript function is known as:

options.A: Constructor
options.D: Self-invoking

question: Which method call returns true only if the currently logged in user has the catalog_admin role and in no other case?

options.A: g_user.hasRole('catalog_admin')
options.D: g_user.hasRoleFromList('catalog_admin')

question: There is a basic strategy when creating a Utils Script Include. Identify the step that does not belong.

options.A: Identify the table
options.D: Create a prototype object from the new class

question: Which roles grant access to source control repository operations such as importing applications from source control, or linking an application to source control? (Choose two.)

options.A: source_control
options.D: git_admin

question: When configuring the content of an Email Notification, which syntax should be used to reference the properties of an event triggering the Notification?

options.A: ${event.<property name>}
options.D: ${gs.<property name>}

question: Which one of the following is true for a Script Include with a Protection Policy value of Protected?

options.A: Any user with the protected_edit role can see and edit the Script Include
options.B: The Protection policy option can only be enabled by a user with the admin role
options.C: The Protection policy is applied only if the glide.app.apply_protection system property value is true
options.D: The Protection Policy is applied only if the application is downloaded from the ServiceNow App Store

question: Which one of the following is true for GlideUser (g_user) methods?

options.A: Can be used in Client Scripts and UI Policies only
options.B: Can be used in Business Rules only
options.C: Can be used in Client Scripts, UI Policies, and UI Actions
options.D: Can be used in Business Rules, and Scripts Includes

question: When configuring a module, what does the Override application menu roles configuration option do?

options.A: Users with the module role but without access to the application menu access the module
options.B: Self-Service users can access the module even though they do not have roles
options.C: Admin is given access to the module even if Access Controls would ordinarily prevent access
options.D: Users with access to the application menu can see the module even if they don't have the module role

question: Which platform feature can be used to determine the relationships between field in an Import Set table to field in an existing ServiceNow table?

options.A: Business Service Management Map
options.D: CI Relationship Builder

question: When configuring a REST Message, the Endpoint is:

options.A: The commands to the REST script to stop execution
options.B: The URI of the data to be accessed, queried, or modified
options.C: Information about the format of the returned data
options.D: The response from the provider indicating there is no data to send back

question: When evaluating Access Controls, ServiceNow searches and evaluates:

options.A: Only for matches on the current table
options.B: Only for matches on the current field
options.C: From the most specific match to the most generic match
options.D: From the most generic match to the most specific match

question: In a Business Rule, which one of the following returns true if the currently logged in user has the admin role?

options.A: g_form.hasRoleExactly('admin')
options.D: gs.hasRoleExactly('admin')

question: Identify one reason an application might NOT be a good fit with ServiceNow.

options.A: Needs workflow to manage processes
options.B: Requires extensive use of low-level programming libraries
options.D: Uses forms extensively to interact with data

question: Identify the incorrect statement about Delegated Development in ServiceNow.

options.A: Administrators can grant non-admin users the ability to develop global applications.
options.B: Administrators can specify which application file types the developer can access.
options.C: Administrators can grant the developer access to script fields.
options.D: Administrators can grant the developer access to security records.

question: One of the uses of the ServiceNow REST API Explorer is:

options.A: Practice using REST to interact with public data providers
options.B: Find resources on the web for learning about REST
options.C: Convert SOAP Message functions to REST methods
options.D: Create sample code for sending REST requests to ServiceNow

question: Which one of the following is true regarding Application Scope?

options.A: All applications are automatically part of the Global scope
options.B: Applications downloaded from 3rd party ServiceNow application developers cannot have naming conflicts
options.C: Any developer can edit any application
options.D: Developers can choose the prefix for a scope's namespace

question: Which one of the following is the baseline behavior of a table in a privately-scoped application?

options.A: The table and its data are not accessible using web services
options.B: Any Business Rule can read, write, delete, and update from the table
options.C: Only artifacts in the table's application can read from the table
options.D: All application scopes can read from the table

question: Which one of the following is NOT a purpose of application scoping?

options.A: Provide a relationship between application artifacts
options.B: Provide a way of tracking the user who developed an application
options.C: Provide a namespace (prefix and scope name) to prevent cross application name collisions
options.D: Provide controls for how scripts from another scope can alter tables in a scoped application

question: What are some of the considerations to document as part of the business process?

options.A: Business problem, data input/output, users/stakeholders, and process steps
options.B: Business problem, data input/output, project schedule, and process steps
options.C: Business problem, data input/output, users/stakeholders, and database capacity
options.D: Business problem, users/stakeholders, available licenses, and database capacity

question: Which of the following statements does NOT apply when extending an existing table?

options.A: The parent table's Access Controls are evaluated when determining access to the new table's records and fields
options.B: The new table inherits the functionality built into the parent table
options.C: The new table inherits all of the fields from the parent table
options.D: You must script and configure all required behaviors

question: Which of the following CANNOT be debugged using the Field Watcher?

options.A: Business Rules
options.D: Access Controls

question: Which objects can be used in Inbound Action scripts?

options.A: current and previous
options.D: current and producer

question: Which one of the following is part of the client-side scripting API?

options.A: workflow.scratchpad
options.D: GlideSystem object (gs)

question: Application developers configure ServiceNow using industry standard JavaScript to:

options.A: Enable the right-click to edit the context menus on applications in the navigator
options.C: Customize the organization's company logo and banner text
options.D: Configure the outgoing email display name

question: How many applications menus can an application have?

options.A: 3, one for an application's user modules, etc.
options.B: As many as the application design requires
options.C: 2, one for an application's user modules and one for admin
options.D: 1, which is used for all application modules

question: The source control operation used to store local changes on an instance for later application is called a(n) <blank>.

options.A: Branch
options.D: Update set

question: What syntax is used in a Record Producer script to access values from Record Producer form fields?

options.A: producer.field_name
options.D: current.field_name

question: Which of the following methods prints a message on a blue background to the top of the current form by default?

options.A: g_form.addInfoMsg()
options.D: g_form.showFieldMsg()

question: A scoped application containing Flow Designer content dedicated to a particular application is called a(n):

options.A: Spoke
options.D: Flow

question: What is a Module?

options.A: The functionality within an application menu such as opening a page in the content frame...
options.B: A group of menus, or pages, providing related information...
options.C: A way of helping users quickly access information by filtering items...
options.D: A web-based way of providing software to end-users

question: Which source control operation is available from BOTH Studio and the Git Repository?

options.A: Create Branch
options.D: Edit Repository Configurations

question: Which one of the following is NOT required to link a ServiceNow application to a Git repository?

options.A: Password
options.D: Application name

question: Which Report Type(s) can be created by right-clicking on a column header in a table's list?

options.A: Bar Chart, Pie Chart, Histogram, and Line
options.C: Bar Chart, Pie Chart, and Histogram
options.D: Bar Chart and Pie Chart
